abstract: Shares of Vonage, the Internet telephone provider, rose sharply after it announced it had settled a patent dispute with Verizon and would have to pay a maximum of $120 million.
snippet: Shares of Vonage, the Internet telephone provider, rose sharply after it announced it had settled a patent dispute with Verizon and would have to pay a maximum of $120 million.
lead_paragraph: Shares in Vonage, the Internet telephone provider, rose sharply in after-hours trading yesterday after the company announced a settlement in a patent dispute with Verizon.

headline.main: Shares Rise as Vonage Settles Fight Over Patent
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise As Vonage Settles Fight Over Patent

abstract: Shares in Vonage, the Internet telephone provider, rose sharply in after-hours trading Thursday after the company announced a settlement in a patent dispute with Verizon.
lead_paragraph: Shares in Vonage, the Internet telephone provider, rose sharply in after-hours trading Thursday after the company announced a settlement in a patent dispute with Verizon.

headline.main: Shares Rise as Vonage Settles Fight Over Patent
